ConfirmRemoval: Are you sure you want to remove the Stickman?
TutorialIntro: Learn how to create animated stickman figures and bring them to life!
NetworkIntro: Connect with other users to share your animations.
PlayPauseIntro: Click here to play or pause your stickman animation.
SpeedIntro: Click here to adjust the speed of your stickman animation.
RemoveIntro: Click here to remove a stickman from your animation.
AddStickmanIntro: Click here to add a new stickman to your animation.
TemplatesIntro: Click here to choose a template for your stickman.
ImportIntro: Click here to import a stickman template.
ExportIntro: Click here to export your stickman animation.
TimelineIntro: View and navigate through your animation frames here. Click on any frame to edit it.
AddFrameIntro: Click here to add a new frame to your animation sequence.
FullScreenIntro: Switch to full screen mode for a better experience.
